item.title: [718] npcspawn command
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Learn how an array works…
http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/java/nutsandbolts/arrays.html

You use the index ‘1’ twice. I wonder why you’re having issues… Perhaps maybe you need the next index after 1?

Read full topic

item.title: [718] npcspawn command
item.dc:creator: @kwelje kwelje
item.description:
@kwelje wrote:

Hello i am trying to make addspawn command have option to choose what direction the npc faces.

if (cmd[0].equals("addnpc") || cmd[0].equals("addspawn")) { int npcId = Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]); int facing = Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]); NpcSpawning.addSpawn(player, npcId, player); NPC.setDirection(Utils.getFaceDirection(facing, -1)); return true; }

Read full topic
